Title: Five Essential Skills for Personal Branding Experts
Content: When building a personal brand, first clarify your core value and appeal to your target audience. Ensure your image and content are memorable, including an identity-appropriate image and easily spreadable slogans or actions. Additionally, develop a unique methodology and theory to support your content, enhancing your professionalism and credibility. Finally, use dissemination strategies to quickly expand your influence, ensuring your content and image leave a lasting impression on your target audience.
